text: Jacobus Martinus Kaper (born 12 September 1931) is a biochemist and virologist who worked at the Henry A. Wallace Beltsville Agricultural Research Center of the Agricultural Research Service of the United States. He has performed research on the cucumber mosaic virus. Kaper was born in Madjalenka, Dutch East Indies. He was elected corresponding member of the Royal Netherlands Academy of Arts and Sciences in 1980. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:Living people Category:Biochemists Category:Members of the Royal Netherlands Academy of Arts and Sciences Category:United States Department of Agriculture people Category:Virologists
title: Jacobus Kaper
